titles.title: Nuclear Regulatory Commission Fee Equity Act of 1994
A bill to provide authority for the NRC to recover costs of regulating Agreement State programs.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S7069)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 6/16/1994--Introduced. Nuclear Regulatory Commission Fee Equity Act of 1994 - Amends the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1990 to permit the Nuclear Regulatory Commission to impose annual charges (in addition to user fees) upon any State with which it has entered into a cooperative agreement under the Atomic Energy Act of 1954.
